== Installation ==

=== Win32 ===

Extract archive to e.g. c:\charconv64 and add c:\charconv64 to your system PATH. (My computer -> Properties -> Advanced -> Environment variables)


=== OS X ===

In Terminal:

  # tar xvzf charconv64-v006-osx.tar.gz
  # cd charconv64-v006-osx
  # sudo cp charconv64 /usr/local/bin/
  # sudo cp acme /usr/local/bin/ (optional)

== Usage ==

Some examples can be found in the examples folder.
